memberdef.name: componentAdderMap
memberdef.initializer: = { {"Position", addPosition}, {"Velocity", addVelocity}, {"Drawable", addDrawable}, {"Collision", addCollision}, {"Acceleration", addAcceleration}, {"Animation", addAnimation}, {"GameConfig", addGameConfig}, {"Controllable", addControllable}, {"Laser", addLaser}, {"Depth", addDepth}, {"Behavior", addBehavior}, {"FFT", addFFT}, {"Spawner", addSpawner}, {"Follower", addFollower} }
